ingredients.ingredient: 15 fresh jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded

cookingTips: Remove jalapeno seeds to reduce heat, but leave some ribs for subtle spice
Cook sausage until browned, breaking it into small pieces for easier stuffing
Chill filled peppers before baking so they hold their shape better
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Stuffed peppers are about balancing heat and flavor. Do you prefer milder peppers, or would you like guidance on heat control?
